Package utils

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
utils.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
The Utils class provides utility methods for various common operations in the blockchain application.

  • Method Details

    • deepCloneHashmap

      public static HashMap<String,Transaction> deepCloneHashmap(HashMap<String,Transaction> givenHashMap)
      Deep clones a HashMap containing Transaction objects.
      Parameters:
      givenHashMap - The HashMap to be cloned.
      Returns:
      A new HashMap with the same entries as the givenHashMap.

    • deepCloneBlockChain

      public static ArrayList<Block> deepCloneBlockChain(ArrayList<Block> blockchain, Object blockLock)
      Deep clones an ArrayList of Block objects.
      Parameters:
      blockchain - The ArrayList to be cloned.
      blockLock - The lock object for synchronizing access to the blockchain.
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList with the same entries as the blockchain.

    • chainString

      public static String chainString(LinkedList<Block> blockChain)
      Generates a string representation of the last six blocks in the blockchain.
      Parameters:
      blockChain - The linked list of blocks representing the blockchain.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the last six blocks in the blockchain.

    • containsAddress

      public static boolean containsAddress(ArrayList<Address> list, Address address)
      Checks if the provided address is present in the list.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of addresses to be checked.
      address - The address to be checked for presence.
      Returns:
      True if the address is present, otherwise false.

    • containsTransactionInMap

      public static boolean containsTransactionInMap(Transaction transaction, HashMap<String,Transaction> mempool)
      Checks if the provided transaction is present in the given mempool.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to be checked for presence.
      mempool - The mempool to search for the transaction.
      Returns:
      True if the transaction is present, otherwise false.

    • eligibleConnection

      public static boolean eligibleConnection(Node node, Address address, boolean connectIfEligible)
      Checks if a connection is eligible and, if specified, establishes the connection.
      Parameters:
      node - The node initiating the connection.
      address - The address to be checked for eligibility.
      connectIfEligible - If true, establishes the connection if eligible.
      Returns:
      True if the connection is eligible, otherwise false.

    • establishConnection

      public static void establishConnection(Node node, Address address)
      Adds a connection to the dynamic list of peers.
      Parameters:
      node - The node initiating the connection.
      address - The address to be added to the list of peers.

    • removeAddress

      public Address removeAddress(Node node, Address address)
      Removes an address from the dynamic list of peers.
      Parameters:
      node - The node initiating the removal.
      address - The address to be removed.
      Returns:
      The removed address, or null if not found.

    • deriveQuorum

      public static ArrayList<Address> deriveQuorum(Block block, int nonce, Config configValues, ArrayList<Address> globalPeers)
      Derives a quorum of addresses from the global peers based on a block's hash and nonce.
      Parameters:
      block - The block for which to derive the quorum.
      nonce - The nonce value used in the mining process.
      configValues - The configuration values for the blockchain.
      globalPeers - The list of global peers in the network.
      Returns:
      The derived quorum of addresses.
